thread.section_title: Frames Direct Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Frames Direct | www.framesdirect.com
thread.title: Jody Rosenberg
thread.title_full: Frames Direct reviewed by Jody Rosenberg

author: Jody Rosenberg
title: Jody Rosenberg
text:
I've never ordered prescription glasses on line before so I was apprehensive. From the very start I was AMAZED at the EXCELLENT CUSTOMER SERVICE!
There was a problem with the frame I ordered though no fault of Frames Direct. Immediately I called and it was addressed right away!
I love this company so much Im ordering another pair of glasses soon.
